query:
SELECT
                n.title,
                n.content,
                ARRAY_AGG(nq.planned_at ORDER BY nq.planned_at) AS "planned_at!",
                ARRAY_AGG(nq.sent_at ORDER BY nq.planned_at) AS "sent_at!: Vec<Option<OffsetDateTime>>"
            FROM notification n
            JOIN notification_queue nq ON nq.notification_id = n.id
            WHERE n.id = $1
            GROUP BY n.id
